phrs.translation: n. 领主之宅邸；庄园主的住宅

sentences.sentence: Manors were private estates of aristocrats or of distinction.
sentences.translation: 庄园是贵族与豪族的私人领地。

sentences.sentence: Branches of your family held manors over all this part of England;
sentences.translation: 在英格兰这一带地方，到处都有你们家族分支的采地；

sentences.sentence: Greece provides us with an alternative romantic getaway to the grandeur of chateaus and gothic manors.
sentences.translation: 希腊为我们的浪漫之旅提供了两种不同的选择——宏伟的城堡，或是哥特式的庄园。
